meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>old woman</kanji>, even with an honorific and an お is still an <vocabulary>old woman</vocabulary>. She might be your <vocabulary>grandmother</vocabulary> as well, though, so be nice!
readingMnemonic: Even if she is your <vocabulary>grandmother</vocabulary>, something is wrong. You look closely at her face. She's a sheep! <reading>Baa!</reading> (ばあ).
